episodes.synopsis: Join Galinha Pintadinha the chicken and her friends as they sing classic and popular songs in colorful, funny settings every child will enjoy.
episodes.title: Lottie Dottie Chicken Vol. 1

episodes.synopsis: Lively animation encourages kids to sing along with 12 new versions of popular Brazilian children's tunes and discover the joys of music and learning.
episodes.title: Lottie Dottie Chicken Vol. 2

video.title: Galinha Pintadinha
video.synopsis: Lottie Dottie chicken and her friends enchant young viewers with catchy songs and amusing animations, all while showing that learning can be fun.
